item.title: [機器學習] Supervised and Unsupervised Learning (監督學習與非監督學習) -Week 1-1
item.description: 第一週 - From Stanford’s coursera Machine Learning Supervised Learning Regression Classification Unsupervised Learning Clustering Cocktail Party Algorithm Machine Learning (機器學習) 定義： Arthur Samuel: the field of study that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed. Tom Mitchell: A computer program is said to learn from experience E with respect to some class of tasks T and performance measure P, if its performance at tasks in T, as measured by P, improves with experience E.
